name: Joined Together by Strings
description:
Controls:

W A S D

Drag with Left click

Gameplay:

You play as white square. You are in space and you have to find parts to join with yourself.
Go to markers to gather more parts. They hang on big squares, drag a smaller square with mouse and attach it to yourself. Some parts have brown squares, those are thrusters and will make you go faster. On the other hand, if you have a lot of grays you will be very slow.

Watch out for flying asteroids, they will destroy any part on impact. If they hit you (white square) you will die and game will restart.

Your goal is to joind as many parts as you can and fly into the black hole, it is marked with purple marker (the one that's a bit further that other markers)
